snippet: The former Barcelona coach Pep Guardiola will take over as coach of Bayern Munich after the Bundesliga season.
abstract: Bayern Munich hires Pep Guardiola as head coach; Guardiola will replace Jupp Heynckes, who plans to retire at end of season.
lead_paragraph: The former Barcelona coach Pep Guardiola will take over as coach of Bayern Munich after the Bundesliga season.

headline.seo: Pep Guardiola to Be Next Coach of Bayern Munich
headline.main: New Coach to Give Bayern Munich a Hint of Barcelona
headline.print_headline: New Coach to Give Bayern Munich a Hint of Barcelona
